sentences.sContent: The flickering insect halo began to drift slowly away, keeping a constant six feet above the earth.
sentences.sContent_eng: The flickering insect halo began to drift slowly away, keeping a constant six feet above the earth.
sentences.sCn: 忽隐忽现的昆虫光环开始慢慢地漂移，一直保持离地六英尺的高度。

synos.tran: 闪烁的，忽隐忽现的；摇曳的

remMethod.val: 来自flicker(v. 闪烁， 摇曳)

words.tran: 弹开；快速的轻打；轻打声
轻弹；忽然摇动；轻轻拂去
闪烁；摇曳；颤动；扑动翅膀；假装昏倒
轻弹；忽然摇动；轻轻拂去

trans.tranCn: 闪烁的， 摇曳的， 忽隐忽现的
